1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 '''Allows to view from camera and detect face and smile'''
3 import sys
4 sys.path.insert(1,'/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages')
5 
6 
7 import rospy
8 from std_msgs.msg import String
9 import cv2
10 from coffebot import convert
11 import time
12 import logging
13 
14 logging.basicConfig(filename='viewer.log', format='[%(asctime)s] %(message)s\n\n',
15  level=logging.ERROR)
16 
17 
18 def main():
19  '''Main function
20  '''
21  try:
22 
23  publisher = rospy.Publisher('image_capture', String, queue_size=1)
24  rospy.init_node('viewer')
25 
26  cap = cv2.VideoCapture(0)
27 
28  print('view start')
29  while True:
30  ret, frame = cap.read()
31  if ret:
32  str_image = convert.ndarray2str(frame)
33  publisher.publish(str_image)
34  time.sleep(0.1)
35 
36  except Exception as e:
37  logging.error(str(e))
38  print(str(e))
39 
40 
41 if __name__ == '__main__':
42  main()
